meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points receiving equal amounts of precipitation.
meanings.sent1: The isohyet on the map shows where it rains the same.
meanings.sent2: Meteorologists use isohyets to study rainfall patterns.
meanings.sent3: The isohyet threw a party for all the rainy spots.
meanings.sent4: The isohyet acted like a ruler, measuring the rain equally.
meanings.sent5: The isohyet danced across the map, marking the rainy areas.

meanings.definition: A line on a map connecting points of equal rainfall.
meanings.sent1: An isohyet helps us see where it rains the same amount.
meanings.sent2: The isohyet line connects areas with matching rainfall.
meanings.sent3: The isohyet made a rainbow out of the rainfall data.
meanings.sent4: The isohyet linked arms with the rainy spots on the map.
meanings.sent5: The isohyet painted a clear picture of the rainfall distribution.
